Reviews: Been using it for 2 months now. Audio and Mic quality is good as expected. The major highlight of this neckband is its battery.  Its battery life has really astonished me. I use it for around 3 hours in a day and it easily lasts 10 to 12 days easily on a single full charge(May vary depending upon the volume at which it is used, I usually use it at around 30%). Plus it charges very rapidly. Takes less than an hour to charge.The only problem I face is that sometimes when I try to connect it to my laptop, it shows that device is connected but the neckband keeps repeating 'Your device is ready to pair' every 2 seconds as if it is in pairing mode even though it is paired. . Similarly when connecting with my phone, it sometimes doesn't connect and the phone shows 'Problem connecting with device'. In both the cases, restarting the neckband fixes the problem.However these two cases are quite rare (once in a hundred). So it is not a major issue for me.Overall it's a great product from BoAt.

The product quality is good. Particularly sound quality is good. Linking with my mobile had been pretty simple and quick. My usage is less and I use it only when I walk. So really cannot comment on battery backup. But for me it came for almost 1 week once I fully charged as I hardly use it for 2 hours per day.The only not so interesting part of this is that, when we walk fast, somehow slowly the earpods come out of ear because of weight of the wire and the mouthpiece. I am not sure if all the bluetooth ear phones will be like that, but this is my observation with this one.

Pros: 1) Audio quality is great. Perfect combination of bass and treble and also the clarity is very good.2) Awesome battery. Charges very fast and last longer. No issue with battery backup.3) Calling and noise cancellation is good.Cons: 1) The wire quality looks very cheap especially considering the price. Boat should invest on durability as well and not only on sound. Because no one wants to go to service center.2) The magnet or probably the design is not well thats why the earphones moves away when took out from ears and stick together with magnet.
